name: customer-api
description: - First, you need to be Download & install Postman. - After that, Download & install Nodejs. - Clone or Download Customer API Repository & import that collection file into your Postman. - Open Powershell window here (Customer API Folder) using shift + right-click.  - Check prerequisite install node version using ( node --version ) - Now need to install Newman using ( npm i newman ) - Run report using Newman:
